website_summaries.verdict: A more natural premium sunscreen blend that doesn't use harmful chemicals, keeping the skin healthy.
pros: Maintains water resistance during physical activity and swimming for up to 80 minutes
cons: Must reapply sunscreen after heavy swimming or exercise

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family uses this, even the baby! And we all have sensitive skin. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: AZ tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for years! My skin is sensitive and I’ve never had any issues. My husband works outside in AZ sun so he’s usually the king of “raccoon eye” tan from sunglasses, not anymore! This works great for him, doesn’t drip off with sweat and isn’t greasy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kbyrley

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time living in a Florida. Lightweight effective sun skin protection. Originally suggested by my esthetician. But is expensive compared to regular pharmacy products.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my semi dry aging skin. I use a hydrating cream base and then apply the Coola. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of the best sunscreens I have ever had, my skin is very sensitive and breaks out easily. This sunscreen is light and smooth to the face.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I’ve been buying it from my esthetician’s office in the past, but last month ran out so I got it on Amazon; love the convince!
customer_reviews.author: Mayya Zinovyeva

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use all year round!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd or 4th time buying this, and I absolutely love it as a daily moisturizer. It is light, not oily at all, and feels fine on your hands after application.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Gaustad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Non greasy, great coverage, non scented though i have tried the white tea and it smells nice but rather not use for face.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great as a morning moisturizer for low maintenance women. My 3rd bottle for the past 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a simple girl without make up and this sun lotion helped reduced my cumbersome routine to keep my face moisturized and healthy. No clogged pores, not itchiness, just a very simple cream that works! The expensive valuable stuff is so worth the money. If Coola doesn't plan to discontinue the product I would buy this again. This my 3rd bottle. I know this small product can be expensive so I use it conservatively to stretch out my pennies. Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Le

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works
customer_reviews.text: I got sun burned a few times. I am really not sure it works. I wanted it to work! Applied several times. It’s light and smells fine but not strong enough for me. Know others who like it. Didn’t cause break outs which was great but not for beach wear. Maybe just for short periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: MTM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Feels like a moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted something that would obviously give me spf but with the consistency of a moisturizer and this is exactly that. The smell is not that typical strong sunscreen smell and it dissipates soon after application. Super sort and moisturizing on the skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The Best.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best liquid facial sunscreen I've ever used. It's very light, my skin can breathe, it's sheer. It smells cute. It's still too uncomfortable to have on my hands so I have to apply it with a makeup sponge or wash it off my hands after applying, but that's every sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have purchased this 4 times and will keep using. I love it. When I was training for my 1/2 marathon I used the ‘sports’ face sunscreen and never had it run into my eyes while sweating. It’s light and absorbs quickly and leaves no residue or film on face. I have used this either under my make up or alone every day for the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Reneejoy

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaves skin shiny
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty good. It doesn’t smell too much like sunscreen and it goes on completely clear. However, it doesn’t seem to fully absorb in my skin and leaves it pretty shiny. I don’t know if I’d buy again for this price. Also it’s not reef safe since it’s not an all zinc product so I definitely wouldn’t wear it in the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sunscreen i have purchased. I have tried expensive brands such as skinceuticals and ended up with pimples and burning sensations throughout the day that would get very red and irritated. Coola works very well with my skin, no pimples no irritation or allergies. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Light , goes on smooth !  Love it ! Buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good face sunscreen and my sister suggested Coola . I love it !!! It is so light and feels like nothing is on your face . It can also be used on vacation to the Caribbean and it won’t ruin the reefs!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! A little bit goes a long way! I used it on me & my 3 year old daughter. It’s light and the scent of sunblock isn’t strong. It’s not oily which is also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: ashley wilson-Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: I researched and wanted to love it, but it broke me out. Everyone’s skin is different so it may be worth a try, but I’m stuck with a near full tube.
customer_reviews.author: BMurph

customer_reviews.title: My second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. It goes on nicely and good protection. I'm was running out of the one I had so had to get a second one. The only little problem would be the smell, it's not bad it just smells like sunscreen. It would've been nice if it smelled of something else
customer_reviews.author: Yancy

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen #1
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lotion not greasy and no scent at all. I am extremely sensitive when it comes to my skin and this product works great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great product. It was so thick thoughthat I wasn't able to get it out of the tube to use it. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: Good but very liquid
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling product and feels nice on skin but it’s quite liquid- more like a body lotion than for face. For that reason I will unfortunately not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: evas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love Coola brand! Not sticky or oily, not heavily scented, great product overall and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but burns eyes
customer_reviews.text: Product goes over skin well with no residue with no oily residue but burns eyes
customer_reviews.author: SVA

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice on but clogs pores
customer_reviews.text: Clogs pores. It’s lightweight but causes breakouts because of silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Super light texture
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this sunscreen. Not sticky, super light in texture, no white film.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna

customer_reviews.title: my FAVORITE face sunscreen so far
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a lot of sunscreens for my face and this is my favorite. It is very lightweight and does not clog my pores, i have not broken out due to this and I love it. It protects my skin very well and is a decent price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This the best facial sunscreen I have ever used! I love it! Goes on smooth and sheen without being thick or greasy. Doesn’t cause me breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hurt my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This actually worked on not getting me burned on my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t burn my face
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, doesn’t burn my face like most sunscreen does. Even the stuff in expensive makeup line moisturizers burns my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Vosbein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun protection feels like you are not wearing anything
customer_reviews.text: None greasy protect and moisturize your skin without with residues
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Order it!
customer_reviews.text: Best face sunscreen I’ve tried after attempting others. Doesn’t feel like sunscreen and provides nice lasting protection. Worth the price, if considering it order it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for face protection.
customer_reviews.text: Very light. You hardly know you’re wearing it. But effective for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This product has a less than premium consistency and performance. I would recommend other less costly brands.
customer_reviews.author: F.C.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me.. not worth the money. Got same coverage as cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: Irma C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen. Doesn’t turn you white like most sunscreens. Very effective and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsie

customer_reviews.title: Not the same formula
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same sunscreen that I have been buying for years with the same name. Caused my skin to break out horribly
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Great for my sensitive skin and doesn’t cause any breakouts. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Girl

customer_reviews.title: Can't get the lotion out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and just went to use it and I can't get the lotion out of the tube. Super bummed I'll need to throw away a $40 sunscreen. Will not purchase again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Erin Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Goes on even with no stickiness fragrance free too.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Light and dries clear no stickiness. Fragrance free too..
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Unger

customer_reviews.title: Non-greasy and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love it that it is non-greasy and covers up my face really evenly. No scent is another plus point!
customer_reviews.author: Xxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Feels silky when applied
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smooth and has the right amount of tint. Has a nice and subtle fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brooks

product_meta.title: COOLA Organic Classic Daily Face Sunscreen Lotion, SPF 50, Reef-Safe, Unscented 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Scent:UnscentedOur organic Classic Face Sunscreens are designed for those long active days in the sun, but light enough for everyday use. Our plant-based oleosome technology optimizes the performance of our formula to help create a fortified protective shield that defends from the sun’s harshest rays, while feeling unbelievably light, non-greasy, and sheer on skin.
Our Farm-to-Face formula is supercharged with our proprietary antioxidant-rich Plant Protection, to help fight free radicals and nourish and strengthen the skin barrier, all year long.

1
At COOLA, we're passionate about creating happy, healthy lifestyle experiences. We believe that clean beauty should feel as good as it is healthy, which is why we develop organic products that you'll love wearing every day.
